main event: A UFO sighting occurred in Upper Greenwood Lake, New Jersey on August 13, 1952. The object was described as shiny, metallic, and spherical, drifting eastward, and was possibly a balloon observation as it had no further identifications.
interesting points: The UFO sighting lasted for 25-30 seconds, observed by a private citizen.
The object was described as spherical, shiny, and metallic, and it was drifting eastward.
The witness mentioned that the object appeared like a large star and moved towards the horizon to the east at high speed.
Some witnesses reported seeing an object with red tips and white lights, while others saw a moving light in the sky very high in the sky.
The UFO sighting occurred in very clear and bright weather conditions with a visibility of 13-15 miles and no cloud cover.
sighted object: shiny, metallic, and spherical object drifting eastward
